articles.title: PNC’s Early Move Into Direct Bitcoin Trading Might Change The Case For Investing In PNC (PNC)
articles.mainIdea: PNC’s Early Move Into Direct Bitcoin Trading Might Change The Case For Investing In PNC (PNC)
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: PNC’s Early Move Into Direct Bitcoin Trading Might Change The Case For Investing In PNC (PNC). Earlier in December 2025, PNC Bank became the first major U.S. bank to enable eligible PNC Private Bank clients to buy, hold and sell spot bitcoin directly through its own digital platform, using Coinbase’s Crypto-as-a-Service infrastructure. This move meaningfully expands PNC’s digital asset capabilities for high- and ultra-high-net-worth clients, tightening the link between traditional private banking services and the crypto market.
